column2: Test Case Title
column3: Test Case Description
column4: Expected Result

column2: Verify app opens successfully
column3: 1) click on the OTO app
column4: App launches without crash

column2: Verify splash video plays on app launch
column3:
1) click on the OTO app
2) splash video shown
column4: Splash video plays fully and navigates to login page

column2: Verify behavior if splash video fails to load
column3:
1) click on the OTO app
2) splash video shown
column4: App skips splash and navigates to login screen

column2: Verify default country code is displayed
column3:
1) click on the OTO app
2) splash video shown
3) login/registration screen shown
column4: Default country code and corresponding flag are shown

column2: Verify user can change country code
column3:
1) click on the OTO app
2) splash video shown
3) login/registration screen shown
4) edit the country code
column4: country code should be editable

column2: Verify flag updates when country code is changed
column3:
1) click on the OTO app
2) splash video shown
3) login/registration screen shown
4) enter the country code
column4: Flag changes according to selected country

column2: Verify invalid country code selection
column3:
1) click on the OTO app
2) splash video shown
3) login/registration screen shown
4) try to enter the code more than 3
column4: App does not accept invalid country code

column2: Verify “+” sign is displayed by default in country code field
column3:
1) click on the OTO app
2) splash video shown
3) login/registration screen shown
column4: “+” sign is visible before the country code

column2: Verify “+” sign is not editable by user
column3:
1) click on the OTO app
2) splash video shown
3) login/registration screen shown
4) try to change edit or remove the + sign
column4: “+” sign cannot be deleted or edited

column2: Verify user cannot enter multiple “+” signs
column3:
1) click on the OTO app
2) splash video shown
3) login/registration screen shown
4) try to add + sign
column4: Input should be restricted to “++” sign

column2: Verify “+” sign and country code are clearly separated
column3:
1) click on the OTO app
2) splash video shown
3) login/registration screen shown
column4:
“+” sign is displayed before the country code
Country code digits are fully visible and not overlapped

column2: Verify “+” sign and country code alignment on different screen sizes
column3:
1) click on the OTO app
2) splash video shown
3) login/registration screen shown
column4: No overlap on small, medium, or large screen devices

column2: Verify user can enter valid mobile number
column3:
1) click on the OTO app
2) splash video shown
3) login/registration screen shown
4) enter the mobile number
column4: Mobile number should be accepted

column2: Verify minimum length of mobile number
column3:
1) click on the OTO app
2) splash video shown
3) login/registration screen shown
4) enter the mobile number till 7 digits
column4:
Mobile number with minimum valid digits is accepted
Min length - 7

column2: Verify maximum length of mobile number
column3:
1) click on the OTO app
2) splash video shown
3) login/registration screen shown
4) enter the mobile number till 15 digits
column4:
Mobile number with maximum valid digits is accepted
max length -15

column2: Verify mobile number less than minimum length
column3:
1) click on the OTO app
2) splash video shown
3) login/registration screen shown
4) enter the mobile number till 5-6 digits
column4: Mobile number should be accepted

column2: Verify mobile number more than maximum length
column3:
1) click on the OTO app
2) splash video shown
3) login/registration screen shown
4) enter the mobile number till 16 digits
column4: Mobile number should be accepted

column2: Verify mobile number with alphabets or special characters
column3:
1) click on the OTO app
2) splash video shown
3) login/registration screen shown
4) enter the mobile number with special character
column4: Input should not be accepted only numeric keyboard should be shown

column2: Verify Continue button is disabled on login screen load
column4: Continue button is disabled by default

column2: Verify Continue button remains disabled when mobile number field is empty
column4: Continue button remains disabled

column2: Verify Continue button remains disabled when mobile number length is less than minimum/MAX
column3:
Pre-Requisite: Mobile number with fewer than
required digits or MAX
column4: Continue button remains disabled

column2: Verify Continue button remains disabled when mobile number contains special characters
column4: Continue button remains disabled

column2: Verify Continue button is enabled when valid mobile number is entered
column3:
1) click on the OTO app
2) splash video shown
3) login/registration screen shown
4) enter the mobile number as per selected country code
column4: Continue button becomes enabled

column2: Verify Continue button is disabled again if valid mobile number is cleared
column4: Continue button remains disabled

column2: Verify login screen UI matches Figma design
column4:
All UI elements (logo, text, fields, buttons) match Figma
No missing or extra components

column2: Verify app logo position and size
column4: Logo alignment, size, and padding match Figma

column2: Verify error messages design matches Figma
column4: Error text color, size, and position match Figma

column2: Verify behavior when there is no internet connection on app launch
column3: Device internet is OFF
column4: User should be given an option to retry

column2: Verify app behavior if internet is restored while splash video is playing
column4:
Splash video resumes or completes
App navigates correctly to login screen

column2: Verify app does not crash during splash error scenarios
column4:
App remains stable
No blank or frozen screen
